Topic.Title: Will they make the $29.15 billion for the quarter

Message.Msg: The crack analyst cvs9yt - the man with an IBM fetish - emotes: "The accountants will make the EPS, but you can not fake the Rev. Q3 was a free pass will they give another free pass for Q4 if Rev is below $29 I think #$%$ around with Employee 401K to save Rev for 2013" Multinational revenue depends on currency translation. Please explain how the Dec 15 rule adds to revenue??? Unless you provide an answer you are forbidden from posting for a week after IBM reports.

Topic.Title: Will they make the $29.15 billion for the quarter

Message.Msg: Does he also have to sit in a corner and think about what he did for 30 minutes?

Message.Title: IMPLOSION
Message.Msg: No one rings a bell when its time to sell. BULL is hanging by its testicles.

Message.Title: Going the right way
Message.Msg: Chart looks good. Strong buy at stoxline website with the 229.45 target price in six months.
